title.rendered: Introducing Video Player Customization, Video Pack, and More!

content.rendered:
We have exciting new announcements for our premium plan subscribers. Starting today, Business and Enterprise users can customize the appearance of the Jumpshare video player to match their branding. In addition, by popular demand, we’ve made Business plan video features available to Plus plan users as part of the Advanced Video Pack add-on.

Customize the Video Player to Match Your Brand

Now change the color of the video player interface to match your custom branding or logo. The color you pick is applied to the play icon and seek bar for both shared and embedded videos. Head on over to Settings > Workspace > Customize to pick your color of choice.

Learn how to customize video player color here.

Video Player Customization is available today for Jumpshare Business and Enterprise users for free and as part of the new Video Pack add-on for Plus users.

Add Business Video Features to Your Plus Plan

When we added automatic captioning and transcription for videos earlier this year, we kept it exclusive to our Business and Enterprise plans given the costs involved for such a resource-intensive feature. We’ve since received several requests for the feature to be made available to Plus users who have fewer than 3 seats.

With the new Advanced Video Pack add-on, Jumpshare Plus subscribers can now unlock Business video features without upgrading to the Business plan. The add-on, priced at an affordable $5/member/month or $50/member/year, will get you automatic captions and transcription, the ability to search for videos by transcription, and video player customization.

Get the add-on today from your Customize settings page.

Share in Our Earnings With the Affiliate Program

If you’re a Jumpshare Plus, Business, or Enterprise user with a love for the product and wish to invite your friends or colleagues to it, you’ll be pleased to know that we now have an affiliate program!

Invite prospective users to upgrade to one of our premium plans using your affiliate link, and get a 20% cut of each new subscription, plus any renewals for up to a year.

Join the Jumpshare Affiliate Program today.
